item.description:
You asked for it, and we are making it happen! An election night meetup!

Tuesday night could be very exciting, so why not spend it with like-minded company! Turn in your ballot and then come into town to celebrate.

Hennessy's will be hosting our meetup group in our usual spot toward the back of the bar.

Best parking is meters (run until 8PM), or Govt Center Garage is $11 if there's nothing at the Garden (nothing on the calendar!).

Invite your friends!
item.how_to_find_us: Back of the bar, just beyond the barrel
item.name: Election Night Meetup
